And<S>2532</S> you<S>5209</S> hath he quickened, who were<S>5607</S> dead<S>3498</S> in trespasses<S>3900</S> and<S>2532</S> sins<S>266</S>;
Wherein<S>1722</S> <S>3739</S> in time past<S>4218</S> ye walked<S>4043</S> according to<S>2596</S> the course<S>165</S> of this<S>5127</S> world<S>2889</S>, according to<S>2596</S> the prince<S>758</S> of the power<S>1849</S> of the air<S>109</S>, the spirit<S>4151</S> that now<S>3568</S> worketh<S>1754</S> in<S>1722</S> the children<S>5207</S> of disobedience<S>543</S>:
Among<S>1722</S> whom<S>3739</S> also<S>2532</S> we<S>2249</S> all<S>3956</S> had our conversation<S>390</S> in times past<S>4218</S> in<S>1722</S> the lusts<S>1939</S> of our<S>2257</S> flesh<S>4561</S>, fulfilling<S>4160</S> the desires<S>2307</S> of the flesh<S>4561</S> and<S>2532</S> of the mind<S>1271</S>; and<S>2532</S> were<S>2258</S> by nature<S>5449</S> the children<S>5043</S> of wrath<S>3709</S>, even<S>2532</S> as<S>5613</S> others<S>3062</S>. <sup>desires: Gr. wills</sup>
But<S>1161</S> God<S>2316</S>, who is<S>5607</S> rich<S>4145</S> in<S>1722</S> mercy<S>1656</S>, for<S>1223</S> his<S>846</S> great<S>4183</S> love<S>26</S> wherewith<S>3739</S> he loved<S>25</S> us<S>2248</S>,
Even<S>2532</S> when we<S>2248</S> were<S>5607</S> dead<S>3498</S> in sins<S>3900</S>, hath quickened us together with<S>4806</S> Christ<S>5547</S>, (by grace<S>5485</S> ye are<S>2075</S> saved<S>4982</S>;) <sup>by: or, by whose grace</sup>
And<S>2532</S> hath raised us up together<S>4891</S>, and<S>2532</S> made us sit together<S>4776</S> in<S>1722</S> heavenly<S>2032</S> places in<S>1722</S> Christ<S>5547</S> Jesus<S>2424</S>:
That<S>2443</S> in<S>1722</S> the ages<S>165</S> to come<S>1904</S> he might shew<S>1731</S> the exceeding<S>5235</S> riches<S>4149</S> of his<S>846</S> grace<S>5485</S> in<S>1722</S> his kindness<S>5544</S> toward<S>1909</S> us<S>2248</S> through<S>1722</S> Christ<S>5547</S> Jesus<S>2424</S>.
For<S>1063</S> by grace<S>5485</S> are ye<S>2075</S> saved<S>4982</S> through<S>1223</S> faith<S>4102</S>; and<S>2532</S> that<S>5124</S> not<S>3756</S> of<S>1537</S> yourselves<S>5216</S>: it is the gift<S>1435</S> of God<S>2316</S>:
Not<S>3756</S> of<S>1537</S> works<S>2041</S>, lest<S>3363</S> any man<S>5100</S> should boast<S>2744</S>.
For<S>1063</S> we are<S>2070</S> his<S>846</S> workmanship<S>4161</S>, created<S>2936</S> in<S>1722</S> Christ<S>5547</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> unto<S>1909</S> good<S>18</S> works<S>2041</S>, which<S>3739</S> God<S>2316</S> hath before ordained<S>4282</S> that<S>2443</S> we should walk<S>4043</S> in<S>1722</S> them<S>846</S>. <sup>ordained: or, prepared</sup>
Wherefore<S>1352</S> remember<S>3421</S>, that<S>3754</S> ye<S>5210</S> being in time past<S>4218</S> Gentiles<S>1484</S> in<S>1722</S> the flesh<S>4561</S>, who<S>3588</S> are called<S>3004</S> Uncircumcision<S>203</S> by<S>5259</S> that which<S>3588</S> is called<S>3004</S> the Circumcision<S>4061</S> in<S>1722</S> the flesh<S>4561</S> made by hands<S>5499</S>;
That<S>3754</S> at<S>1722</S> that<S>1565</S> time<S>2540</S> ye were<S>2258</S> without<S>5565</S> Christ<S>5547</S>, being aliens<S>526</S> from the commonwealth<S>4174</S> of Israel<S>2474</S>, and<S>2532</S> strangers<S>3581</S> from the covenants<S>1242</S> of promise<S>1860</S>, having<S>2192</S> no<S>3361</S> hope<S>1680</S>, and<S>2532</S> without God<S>112</S> in<S>1722</S> the world<S>2889</S>:
But<S>1161</S> now<S>3570</S> in<S>1722</S> Christ<S>5547</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> ye<S>5210</S> who<S>3588</S> sometimes<S>4218</S> were<S>5607</S> far off<S>3112</S> are made<S>1096</S> nigh<S>1451</S> by<S>1722</S> the blood<S>129</S> of Christ<S>5547</S>.
For<S>1063</S> he<S>846</S> is<S>2076</S> our<S>2257</S> peace<S>1515</S>, who<S>3588</S> hath made<S>4160</S> both<S>297</S> one<S>1520</S>, and<S>2532</S> hath broken down<S>3089</S> the middle wall<S>3320</S> of partition<S>5418</S> between us;
Having abolished<S>2673</S> in<S>1722</S> his<S>846</S> flesh<S>4561</S> the enmity<S>2189</S>, even the law<S>3551</S> of commandments<S>1785</S> contained in<S>1722</S> ordinances<S>1378</S>; for to<S>2443</S> make<S>2936</S> in<S>1722</S> himself<S>1438</S> of twain<S>1417</S> one<S>1519</S> <S>1520</S> new<S>2537</S> man<S>444</S>, so making<S>4160</S> peace<S>1515</S>;
And<S>2532</S> that he might reconcile<S>604</S> both<S>297</S> unto God<S>2316</S> in<S>1722</S> one<S>1520</S> body<S>4983</S> by<S>1223</S> the cross<S>4716</S>, having slain<S>615</S> the enmity<S>2189</S> thereby<S>1722</S> <S>846</S>: <sup>thereby: or, in himself</sup>
And<S>2532</S> came<S>2064</S> and preached<S>2097</S> peace<S>1515</S> to you<S>5213</S> which<S>3588</S> were afar off<S>3112</S>, and<S>2532</S> to them that were nigh<S>1451</S>.
For<S>3754</S> through<S>1223</S> him<S>846</S> we<S>2192</S> both<S>297</S> have<S>2192</S> access<S>4318</S> by<S>1722</S> one<S>1520</S> Spirit<S>4151</S> unto<S>4314</S> the Father<S>3962</S>.
Now<S>3767</S> therefore<S>686</S> ye are<S>2075</S> no more<S>3765</S> strangers<S>3581</S> and<S>2532</S> foreigners<S>3941</S>, but<S>235</S> fellowcitizens<S>4847</S> with the saints<S>40</S>, and<S>2532</S> of the household<S>3609</S> of God<S>2316</S>;
And are built<S>2026</S> upon<S>1909</S> the foundation<S>2310</S> of the apostles<S>652</S> and<S>2532</S> prophets<S>4396</S>, Jesus<S>2424</S> Christ<S>5547</S> himself<S>846</S> being<S>5607</S> the chief corner<S>204</S> stone;
In<S>1722</S> whom<S>3739</S> all<S>3956</S> the building<S>3619</S> fitly framed together<S>4883</S> groweth<S>837</S> unto<S>1519</S> an holy<S>40</S> temple<S>3485</S> in<S>1722</S> the Lord<S>2962</S>:
In<S>1722</S> whom<S>3739</S> ye<S>5210</S> also<S>2532</S> are builded together<S>4925</S> for<S>1519</S> an habitation<S>2732</S> of God<S>2316</S> through<S>1722</S> the Spirit<S>4151</S>.
